definition: Bloomberg (name)/Michael Bloomberg (1942-), US billionaire businessman, politician and philanthropist
Bloomberg L.P., financial software services, news and data company

sentences.english: His theory was reported by Bloomberg News on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 他的理论于周二被彭博新闻社报导。

sentences.english: That was less than the median estimate of 55 in a Bloomberg News survey of 13 economists.
sentences.chinese: 比彭博资讯13位经济学家调查预测中值为55要少。

sentences.english: King is a writer for Bloomberg Businessweek in San Francisco.
sentences.chinese: 金是位于三藩市的一名彭博商业周刊的作家。

sentences.english: Both Ablin and Romer appeared on Bloomberg Television.
sentences.chinese: 埃布林和罗默同时出现在彭博电视上做出上述阐述。

sentences.english: With the central school-board disbanded[1], the mayor got to work.
sentences.chinese: 学区教育委员会的解散，彭博的改革也开始了。

sentences.english: Hoey told Bloomberg Television he expects rates will fall further.
sentences.chinese: 侯伊告诉彭博新闻社说，他预期利率还会下降。

definition: Bloomberg L.P., financial software services, news and data company
Wall Street, New York/by extension, American big business

pinyin: Ying1 guo2 shi2 you2 gong1 si1
Guo2 ji4 Qing1 suan4 Yin2 hang2

definition: the Stars and Stripes (US flag)/by extension, the United States of America/abbr. for Citibank 花旗銀行|花旗银行
